EmailTemplate.name: Service/Maintenance Contract: Dragen Subscription Low Quota Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your DRAGEN™ license usage is low! Renew your license now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
You only have {!SVMXC__Service_Contract__c.Gb_Balance__c} GB to use with your DRAGEN™ license. To continue to use the software and ensure your uptime, simply renew your subscription by reaching out your sales representative.
We look forward to continuing to help you achieve your goals with genomics!
We’re Here to Help
If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to your sales representative or email us at customerservice@illumina.com.
Sincerely,
The Software Team at Illumina Illumina Website: www.illumina.com Support site: www.support.illumina.com
